attributes.action: help restore public confidence in the Government and its management of the economy by calling an immediate General Election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current financial crisis seems to be deepening by the day. Further cuts in interest rates and quantitative easing will not fix the economy, in fact it may well make things worse. 
The electorate as well as investors have lost confidence in the economy and the Government of the day. 

In my view the best way of restoring confidence would be to call an immediate General Election and let the public decide whether Brown's Government have got what it takes to get us out of this mess.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
